name: Trust the Thrust
description:
You can't escape a black hole, but you can at least try to get a decent highscore!

Concept:

Thrust yourself away from the black hole to dodge projectiles. You can change your direction of movement by speeding up and slowing down since you are orbiting around the black hole. You need to collect shiny orbs to gain points. You can predict and expect where the orb will be a few seconds later by understanding the physics of the black hole and speeding up at the perfect time. You need to Trust the Thrust.

Can you beat my highscore of 28? It is a tough game. Comment your highscore bellow!

Download the game for better performance and audio quality.

How to play:

Hold ANYTHING to thrust

Press "P" to toggle post-processing

Press "M" to toggle the music

Android version:

Hold to thrust

Tap with two fingers at the same time to toggle post-processing

This game was made in about 3 hours for the Trijam #200.

Theme: Expect the unexpected

programming and art - made by myself in less than 3 hours

music - made by myself before the jam for another game

Headphones recommended!
